friends.name: Charlton Heston
descriptions: You maniacs! You blew it up!
Oh, there were women. Lots of women, lots of love-making, but no love. You see, that was the kind of world we'd made. So I left, because there was no one to hold me there.
I can't help thinking that somewhere in the universe there has to be something better than man - has to be.

But one more thing - if anybody's listening, that is. Nothing scientific. It's purely personal. But seen from out here everything seems different. Time bends. Space is boundless. It squashes a man's ego. I feel lonely. That's about it. Tell me, though. Does man, that marvel of the universe, that glorious paradox who sent me to the stars, still make war against his brother? Keep his neighbor's children starving?
It's a mad house! A mad house!
Doctor, would an ape make a human doll - that talks?
starredGreetings:
Hello, Charlton Heston here.
These are your starred players.

Greetings!
This is Charlton Heston.

Howdy, Charles here.
Take a look at your starred players.

friends.name: Ogre Magi
greetings: Is that a squirrel? Come on.
They picked me! No one ever picks me.
I'm the Ogre Magi! No, you are!
What, it ain't started already? I thought it started.
Now that's skill. Well I practice a lot.
That's how we do. Pure skill.
starredGreetings:
Ogre here!
Starred players are below.

We say hi!
Your starred players are below.

Hi! Hi!
We found your starred players!

Ogre Magi is back.
And with your starred players!

friends.name: Enchantress
greetings: Light of foot, light of heart!
Shady lanes and sunny glades await!
It's a hop, skip and a jump!
starredGreetings:
Sproink!
Here are your starred players!

Enchantress gamboling on!
Starred players are here.

Hello! Enchantress is in.
These are your starred players.

friends.name: Slardar
greetings: The deep ones send me forth.
I guard what slumbers in the deeps.
starredGreetings:
I am Slardar.
These are your starred players.

Slardar here, back from the deeps.
Starred players below.

Greetings from the deeps.
Slardar brings your starred players.

friends.name: Puck
greetings: This should be less tiresome than another age in chrysalis.
What is this, a game of some sort?
In your tongue, I am known as Puck.
starredGreetings:
I am known as Puck.
And these are known as your starred players.
One Puck, two Puck, three Puck more!

Puck is here.
Along with your starred players.

friends.name: Axe
greetings: There is no team in Axe!
Axe will whittle them down one by one.
There can be no battle till Axe is at hand. And Axe is.
starredGreetings:
Axe is ready.
And so are your starred players.

Axe returns.
Here are starred players.

Axe brings the Red Mist!
Along with your starred players.

friends.name: Pudge
greetings: So much meat, so little time.
Look at all that meat just waiting to be carved.
starredGreetings:
Oy, Pudge here!
Here are your starred players.

Make room for Pudge!
And make room for your starred players.

Pudge here.
These are your starred players.
